briefTitle: Reducing Cancer Disparities for American Indians in the Rural Intermountain West
officialTitle: Reducing Cancer Disparities for American Indians in the Rural Intermountain West
conditions: Prostate Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Breast Cancer, Cervical Cancer, Lung Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proportion of individuals receiving recommended screening for prostate, breast, colorectal, and cervical cancer.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Enrolled in Medicare Part B
* Self-reported American Indian

Exclusion Criteria:

* Have cancer other than study cancer
* Medicare Part C enrolled
